snippet: The focus will be on the quarterbacks when Peyton Manning faces his brother Eli, but the Giants view the game against the Broncos as a chance for their defense to shine.
abstract: Focus will be on quarterbacks Peyton Manning and his brother Eli when Denver Broncos take on New York Giants in Week 2 of NFL, but Giants view game as a chance for their defense to shine.
lead_paragraph: The focus will be on the quarterbacks when Peyton Manning faces his brother Eli, but the Giants view the game against the Broncos as a chance for their defense to shine.

headline.main: Broncos’ Attack Offers Test for Giants
headline.print_headline: Facing Attack That Can Light Up Scoreboards, Giants’ Defense Looks to Shine
